title: Disney Records - The Music Behind the Magic 4CD 192kbps
description:
This soundtrack collection is currently out of print and can&#039;t be purchased.
It is for this reason that I have provided it. Should you wish to download
and keep, please try to buy the set from sites like eBay or Amazon marketplace,
or buy the movie soundtracks that are available.

IF YOU LIKE IT, BUY IT

This is presented for people waiting to buy the set, or who own it and need a backup. The collector&#039;s set is quite exquisite and includes a full colour book!
